version_description:
Ride a wave at the beach... bounce off a kite... hitch a ride on a floating anti-gravity platform - or a rocket! Dropping a ball into a bucket has never been more fun or more challenging! 20 new levels are waiting for you to manipulate and solve.

A number of other minor edits and performance enhancements have also been made to improve gameplay. Enjoy!

Stuck on an tough level? Now you can unlock the entire game - and get 8 bonus levels too!

Also, a few minor edits and enhancements. Thanks for playing!

After numerous requests and lots of excellent feedback, this update adds a dedicated pause button! Also, youâ€™ll see a skip level option which appears every once in awhile :)

Also a number of other fixes and performance enhancements. Thank you for playing!
iOS 11 and iPhone X support!  Also a few other improvements. Thanks for playing!
Obstacles are now a bit more lively and responsive when flipped!  If an obstacle cannot be flipped, you'll hear a special sound.  Also, a few other minor improvements.  Thanks for playing!
Just a minor maintenance update.  Oh, and no more ads :)  Enjoy the game!
In addition to a few minor update and improvements, Drop Flip is now free!
Improved gameplay with a new dedicated level restart button!  Also, quicker progression between levels and other minor improvements.
A few minor updates and fixes to improve gameplay.
Minor updates and improvements for iOS 12.
Screenshots for the new iPhones and a few other minor updates.
Fix bug that prevented completion of level 4.  Also improved drag sensitivity of movable obstacles for devices with 3D Touch enabled.  Thanks for playing!
Fix bug that prevented completion of level 4.  Also improved drag sensitivity of movable obstacles for devices with 3D Touch enabled.  Thanks for playing!
